author: sakura-ngt
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces the following changes:

- Introduce a new module `ScoutingRecHitAnalyzer` for monitoring reconstructed EB and HBHE rechits in scouting data.
- Add infrastructure to run the `ScoutingRecHitAnalyzer` within the DQM framework.
- Refactor L1 bits handling for scouting in both online and offline sequences.
- Make the top-level folder name configurable to support calo RecHit monitoring outputs.
- Update HLT DQM offline sequences to include `hltScoutingMonitoringRecHits` only for the Run3 Scouting 2025 era via the appropriate era modifier.
- Support new `bookProfile2D` method in `DQMStore` for variable bin size histograms.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully the following tests:
- DQM online: `scram b runtests_TestDQMOnlineClient-scouting_dqm_sourceclient`
- DQM offfline: `runTheMatrix.py -l  16834.0 -t 4 -j 8`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, no backport needed. Foreseen to be used in the 2026 pp run.
title: [NGT] Add `ScoutingRecHitAnalyzer` and integrate Calo RecHit monitoring into DQM for scouting 2025 era
